title: To Whom It May Concern
lyrics:
[Intro]
Hello? Yeah this is Doctor School Sucks to inform you that your son Kevin Pouya.. He's failing my class
He's always late for class, he's always asleep, he's never paying attention..
And when he's up, you know, he's running around the class just disturbing everyone..
I had to kick him out of class yesterday, because some girl had her hands in his pants doing god knows what in the back of my class
[Verse 1]
I can't wait for the day, to tell my momma we made it
The whole family waiting, they talking, always debating
Whether I'm doing good,
 I'm feeling misunderstood
I know I dropped out of school, your friends think I am a fool
I know what that means to you, I know what you're going through
I'm always here for you, I hope you know that it's true
This one's for you, rapping what I love to do
I know I got your support, so we'll gon' make it through
Die for ya, you know I'd die for ya
Imma make this money, Imma get you something
Gonna prove everybody, that I don't live for nothing
You raised me, and you gave me, everything you could, so I thank you
You raised me, and you gave me, everything you could, so I thank you
You raised me, and you gave me, everything you could, so I thank you
I gotta do (I gotta do), What I gotta do (What I gotta do)
I wanna hear you say (I wanna hear you say), I ain't mad at you (I ain't mad at you). (x4)
